p: Epidemiological investigations revealed that the spread of SARS-CoV outside China began on February 21, 2003. When 12 people staying at the Metropole Hotel in Hong Kong were infected with the SARS-CoV from an asymptomatic and infected Professor of the Zhongshan University. These 12 people were responsible for spreading the infection to Singapore, Vietnam, Canada, Ireland, and the United States - starting the chain of infection in all these countries. According to WHO estimates, the majority of the more than 8000 probable cases of SARS worldwide originated from this initial contagion [ 14].
